i palud miciyan tu lami’, awawen aku ciniza.
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.
大家好。我們開始了。: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。

tacuwa tu ci Lami’?
Where did Lami’ go?

tayza i palubuan mizakep tu tulakuk ciniza.
She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

baki, iniwtu kami.
Grandfather, we’re here.

caay ka i luma’ ku baki namu, i umah ciniza, i luma’ kamu mihalhal cinizaan taluma’.
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.
大家好。我們開始了。: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他回來吧。

tayni kisu sinaama!
Uncle, you’re here!

matenes caay kaazih, talakaw tu kisu.
I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

manamuh makaazih katayni isu.
It’s so good to see you.

u sapabeli tamuwan kuyni a padingan, a pazengen i pingsyang.
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.
大家好。我們開始了。: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。

matenes caay katayni, awawen aku ku katuuday mapulung mukan.
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.
大家好。我們開始了。: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。

sapica kalibutan tu, ucya ku nanumen aku, tayni i tumunaw malpadang kita.
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.
大家好。我們開始了。: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。

kukay tu pahalhal nu misu, ataluma’ tu kaku.
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.
大家好。我們開始了。: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。

nasawni nipacukan kuyni tulakuk, pataluma’en haymaw han mukan.
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.
大家好。我們開始了。: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。

nakamuan nu misu atu aku anucila namalahuk kapah tu haw?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?
大家好。我們開始了。: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?

kapah tu, nakamuan nu mita icuwa masasuazih?
Sure, where should we meet?

nakamuan nu mita cacudadan kapah tu haw? amisasing kita.
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.
大家好。我們開始了。: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。

tayza pakayingan kapah tu, asilusid kaku tayza.
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.
大家好。我們開始了。: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。

niyazu’ay niyam a sakulal salungan ku bitelak. halhal tu bitelak nu balu katayni mikilim takuwan!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!
大家好。我們開始了。: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!

halhal katukuh tu sadingsingan, mautang tu!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?
大家好。我們開始了。: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!

katayni pipalamalan kisu!
Then come during our Harvest Festival!
大家好。我們開始了。: 那你豐年祭的時候來吧!

hang i! halhalen aku!
Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

hani kya malimad taluma’ i niyazu’ mauzip kisu?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?
大家好。我們開始了。: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?

ataluma’ pasubana’ tu cudad kaku.
I want to return to teach at the local school.

mahica caay ka i tukay pasubana’ tu cudad?
Why not teach in the city?

zayhan mabulah kaku tu niyazu’ aku, maydih aca pasukas tu niyazu’ay.
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.
大家好。我們開始了。: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。

matineng mitenun kisu, cima ku pasubana’ay tisuwan?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?
大家好。我們開始了。: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?

u bai aku, u samatinengay mitenun a tademaw nu niyazu’ niyam ciniza.
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.
大家好。我們開始了。: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。

kya maydih minanam mitenun kisu?
How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

u lalangawan nu niyam ku mitenun, maydih a panayat tu lalangawan kaku.
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.
大家好。我們開始了。: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。

asu’ kanen kuyni a elaw.
This millet wine is delicious.

nu maku nisaelawan yu!
I made it myself!

mati:neng kisu, matenes misaelaw tuyni haw?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?
大家好。我們開始了。: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?

caay, pakala tu cacay a lipay kapah tu. ayawen mihudhud mingaay ku belac atu hakhak, palamel han tu sapakulit papulung han mikiwakiw palalecad, pazeng han tu i labu nu tedus kapah tu.
No, it only takes about a week. After steaming the sticky rice and white rice, we mix it with yeast powder, and then it can be stored in a jar.
大家好。我們開始了。: 不用，大約一周就好了。把糯米和白米先蒸熟，再加入麴粉一起拌勻，就可以裝到甕裡了。

canan ku nipacakay isu?
What do you sell?

izaw itini ku nu maku dukiyu atu daydam, hatu nipalumaan nu maku!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!
大家好。我們開始了。: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!

hamin tusa kunicakay pina ku kalisiw?
How much for both?

mapulung tusa a lasubu izaw ku lima a bataan ku kalisiw.
250 dollars in total.

manamuh tuyni a zikuc kaku, pina ku kalisiw?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?
大家好。我們開始了。: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?

lima a lasubu ku kalisiw nuyni.
It’s 500 dollars.

matekes tatu, la’tus saadidi’en haw?
It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?

amana’ saadidi’en masipun kaku.
No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

hang i, uyza lumeni’ay a zikuc ku kaydihan aku.
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.
大家好。我們開始了。: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。

uyni siuy atu uyni bakan ku kaydihan aku.
I want this knife and this pot.
大家好。我們開始了。: 我要這把刀和這個鍋子。

pulung tusa a malebut ku kalisiw, uyni nalimaan nisanga’an nu maku, tatenga’ matenes miyung.
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.
大家好。我們開始了。: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。

siwkayen aku ku cabay tayni micakay, kapah ahemi’en tuatudi’ haw?
I’ll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?
大家好。我們開始了。: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?

hang! padangen kisu mipica’ tu walu.
Alright! I’ll give you a 20% discount.

awza azihazihen! izaw amin ku nipacakay tu tupel zikuc.
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.
大家好。我們開始了。: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。

hani pina ku kalisiw nu zikuc?
How much for the clothes?

tulu a lasubu izaw ku lima a bataan ku kalisiw nu cacay a zikuc. cacay a malebut ku kalisiw nu tuluay a zikuc.
One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

cacay ku nicakay aku kapah tu, pabelien kaku tu baluhay.
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.
大家好。我們開始了。: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。

mahica tu, maydih kaku micakay tu hakhak atu makaw silaw.
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.
大家好。我們開始了。: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和山胡椒滷肉。

mamin tu mapacakay ku hemay. izaw henay ku tana’ tinpula aku, maydih micakay kisu haw?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?
大家好。我們開始了。: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎?

hang i! pabelien kaku tu cacay, anuayaw tayni tu kaku micakay.
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.
大家好。我們開始了。: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。

hang, padangen aku kisu mipazeng i alubu, mahini lima a bataan ku kalisiw.
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
